name: Verius Est Parvum
description:
- FULLSCREEN LAGS ON OLD COMPUTERS-

Thanks Noa for giving me the opportunity for more stress and pain, I want to improve my game dev skills!

- CONTROLS -

Left and right - A, D

Jump - Space

- RULES -

- The less life you have, the more speed you get, the more ghosts are there.

- Yellow tiles doubles your points but ghosts can get you from there, grey tiles are safe but they take away points.

- Ghosts remove 1 life.
